abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.description: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

abilities.name: aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

abilities.name: anticipation
abilities.description: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective move, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit KO move.

abilities.name: big-pecks
abilities.description: Protects against Defense drops.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.description: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

abilities.name: chlorophyll
abilities.description: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.

abilities.name: cloud-nine
abilities.description: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

abilities.name: competitive
abilities.description: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

abilities.name: compound-eyes
abilities.description: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3×.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.description: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.description: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

abilities.name: dry-skin
abilities.description: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: early-bird
abilities.description: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.description: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: flash-fire
abilities.description: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

abilities.name: forewarn
abilities.description: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

abilities.name: friend-guard
abilities.description: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.description: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: hydration
abilities.description: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

abilities.name: hyper-cutter
abilities.description: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.description: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

abilities.name: inner-focus
abilities.description: Prevents flinching.

abilities.name: insomnia
abilities.description: Prevents sleep.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: justified
abilities.description: Raises Attack one stage upon taking damage from a dark move.

abilities.name: keen-eye
abilities.description: Prevents accuracy from being lowered.

abilities.name: levitate
abilities.description: Evades ground moves.

abilities.name: magic-guard
abilities.description: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

abilities.name: mold-breaker
abilities.description: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.

abilities.name: moxie
abilities.description: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

abilities.name: multiscale
abilities.description: Halves damage taken from full HP.

abilities.name: neutralizing-gas
abilities.description: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

abilities.name: overgrow
abilities.description: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

abilities.name: rain-dish
abilities.description: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.

abilities.name: rock-head
abilities.description: Protects against recoil damage.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.description: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.description: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: sniper
abilities.description: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

abilities.name: solar-power
abilities.description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.

abilities.name: soundproof
abilities.description: Protects against sound-based moves.

abilities.name: static
abilities.description: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: stench
abilities.description: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.description: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: swift-swim
abilities.description: Doubles Speed during rain.

abilities.name: synchronize
abilities.description: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

abilities.name: tangled-feet
abilities.description: Doubles evasion when confused.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.description: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

abilities.name: tinted-lens
abilities.description: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

abilities.name: torrent
abilities.description: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

locations: mt ember 1f cave behind team rocket
